The empirical literature shows that the Mann–Kendall test can ascertain the significance of trends in climatic variables (Douglas et al., 2000; Gocic & Trajkovic, 2013; Modarres & Silva, 2007; Partal & Kahya, 2006; Pickson et al., 2020; Tabari & Marofi, 2011; Tabari et al., 2011b; Yue et al., 2002).
